body_html:
Could you provide more information, specifically, instructions on reproducing your problem? Ideally if it can be cut down to a small snippet that doesn't depend on external libraries (like sugartensor used in the code you linked to)?

Without looking at how you're splitting the model across GPUs and/or the full trace, it is a bit hard to provide a useful response. Thanks!

body:
Could you provide more information, specifically, instructions on reproducing your problem? Ideally if it can be cut down to a small snippet that doesn't depend on external libraries (like `sugartensor` used in the code you linked to)?

Without looking at how you're splitting the model across GPUs and/or the full trace, it is a bit hard to provide a useful response. Thanks!
